p: Safety is also inherent the use of NP from raw materials for food formulation regarding their origin and synergy among ingredients ( Abdel-Rahman et al., 2011). In the past years, the food industry has been involved in monitoring the NP safety on the market, supported by the US Food and Drug Administration ( FDA) and the European Food Safety Authority (EFSA). Such organizations act as a scientific guarantor in deciding what NPs are safe to be used as food.
